# magic12stars

The goal of magic12stars is to ask for an input of a date and
    returns the corresponding astrological sign if
    one is born on that day. It is meant to be for fun!

## Installation

You can install the released version of magic12stars from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("magic12stars")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(magic12stars)
## basic example code
```
